description: mDNSResponder.exe is vulnerable to DLL Sideloading attack. Executable improperly specifies how to load the DLL, from which folder and under what conditions. In these scenarios, a malicious attacker could be using the valid and legitimate executable to load malicious files.

product.name: Audinate Dante Application Library for Windows

enisaIdProduct.product_version: All versions prior to and including 1.2.0
